data.text:
@BCEFA @brucesp50158919 @charitybuzz @heatherheadley @KimmelCenter @springsteen Looking good still Bruce I use to have a big crush on you when I was in high school. Fun when I look back at those days.i liked all your music But I really liked Glory Days and Born in the USA. 
My 2 favorites.

@jlyn1252 @charitybuzz @heatherheadley @KimmelCenter @springsteen Yes, there will be a site with #BroadwayFlea auction items. We will currently building it and it will be live soon for online pre-bidding.
@BCEFA @charitybuzz @heatherheadley @KimmelCenter @springsteen Is there site with all auction items this year? Link? Thank you.
